title: International AKJ Smagam
report: Sri Guru Singh Sabha Gurdwara Derby is humbled to announce that it has been chosen to host the International AKJ Smagam 2014. It has taken place here over the last few year, to which we are very thankful to Sri Guru Granth Sahib Maharaj. We anticipate that it will be even more successful this year, however, we cannot do this without your help, so if you can pledge your time to help, please contact one of the sevadaar, furthermore, please invite all of your relatives to attend this Maahan Smagam.

title: Jobs at Sri Guru Singh Sabha Gurdwara
report:
Sri Guru Singh Sabha Gurdwara are always looking for individuals on a rolling basis to perform the duties of a religious worker.
Main Duties:
  • Parkash of Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji
  • Nitnem
  • Sukhmani Sahib Paath
  • Katha Vichaar in Mornings and Evenings
  • Rehras Sahib
  • Sukhasan of Sri Guru Granth Sahib Ji
  • Explanation of religious matters to Adults & Children
Location: Derby
Duration & Renumeration: 12 months, attractive salary will be according to UK Law. Board & lodging is provided.
Closing Date: N/A - we are constantly looking for new talent.
